show_name: Digimon Adventure: Bokura no War Game (movie)
other_title: デジモンアドベンチャー / ぼくらのウォーゲーム (Japanese)
數碼寶貝 我們的戰爭遊戲 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: A mysterious viral Digimon named Diaboromon threatens the digital world and the real world. The Chosen Children must work with their partner Digimon to stop this deadly creature from taking over the entire human computer network and causing a war in the real world. Yet the only way to win may be a stage of evolution never before seen.
ending_theme: uhin #2 Haru I Chouchou~Bokura no Wargame~" by AiM
